page.title: 11The White Horse Pub.cont.
page.content: pieces,sausages and chips,breakfast grills,and ploughman's lunches.Here is a sample of the evening's menu...soup with roll and butter,prawn cocktail, egg mayonnaise, smoked mackerel,melon, with the usual steaks and grills.Over the bar they sell crisps, peanuts and twiglets.Beer is the most popular drink at this pub,but people also drink soft drinks and spirits.Fruit and cigarette machines are very popular.There is always background music playing.Mr.Duffin is the landlord of the White Horse, and he and his wife have two dogs, one labrador and one mongrel.So far the pub has had two break-ins.
